meanings.definition: Situated or done within the walls of a building
meanings.sent1: The intramural library event was held inside the school.
meanings.sent2: The intramural art exhibition took place in the school's hallway.
meanings.sent3: The intramural chess tournament in the classroom was intense.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the intramural meeting room echoed within the walls.
meanings.sent5: The cozy intramural study group was a hit among students.

meanings.definition: Involving students from within the same institution competing against each other in sports or other activities
meanings.sent1: The intramural soccer match between the school teams was exciting.
meanings.sent2: Students enjoyed the intramural basketball game on campus.
meanings.sent3: The intramural debate competition got heated in the classroom.
meanings.sent4: The intramural talent show showcased the school's hidden gems.
meanings.sent5: The intramural relay race brought out the competitive spirit in everyone.
